video.title: Larva
video.synopsis: Two curious worms spend their days investigating the otherworldly objects that fall through the grate into their subterranean world.

episodes.synopsis: Red and Yellow fight over an ice cream that falls down the grate. A strange liquid makes mushrooms grow. Red and Yellow get stuck to the same gum.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Red and Yellow are hit by a bolt that gives them an amazing and mysterious power. After an emotional day, Red metamorphoses into a cocoon.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Yellow and Red defend themselves from an attacking swarm of insects with snowballs. Red and Yellow are caught in a flood and in danger of drowning.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: It’s Christmas Eve, Red and Yellow are freezing, and Santa Claus appears with a gift for them. A familiar-looking "terminator" visits the grate.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Yellow and Red are bitten by a mosquito and turn into vampires. The clock is keeping Red and Yellow awake, so Yellow starts dancing.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Yellow and Red are stuck with superglue. A spider catches everyone in its web. Yellow decides to take care of a baby chick.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: A prince with magic powers falls into the grate and Red wants to take advantage of him. A subterraneous monster has swallowed Yellow, and Red’s next.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Pink turns into a cocoon, about to transform into a butterfly. Red and Yellow compete against Brown and Black in a show on ice.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Red and Yellow find food (and danger) around every corner; Red struggles to blow bubbles; Red, Yellow and Brown get locked in the freezer; and more.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: A simple spider bite grants Yellow incredible powers; Red is heartbroken; Yellow gets a little too good at plate-spinning; and more.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A trapped Black needs Yellow and Red's help to break free; Red and Yellow give other insects makeovers; Red won't share his chewing gum; and more.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Red and Yellow attempt to build their own arms and legs; Rainbow urges Yellow to get in shape; Prism gets caught in a fan; and more.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Red isn't sure whether he's asleep or awake; Yellow finds cookies that foretell the future; Red finds (and loses) love; and more.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Red and Yellow get locked out in the cold; Red and Yellow recount their first meeting; Red and Yellow stage a competitive car race; and more.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Red bumps his head and gets amnesia; Black and Brown pay the price for eating beans; a frog wants to eat Red and Yellow; and more.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Red and Yellow yearn to be butterflies; the gang eats some bad berries; Red and Yellow come face-to-face with a wrecking ball; and more.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The larvae fight over a doughnut; Red, Yellow and Brown scramble to keep a fire alive; The larvae try to block a blizzard from entering their shelter.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The larvae lead a rat on a high-wire chase; Red and Yellow find trouble in a jar of garlic cloves; Red awakens with creased eyelids that attract Pink.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The larvae get caught in the middle of a pigeon conversation; A nightmare about a deluge leads Red to build an ark; A mite becomes attached to Yellow.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Brown's bad breath proves to be deadly; The larvae and Brown see how high they can stack objects; Yellow tests a few theories on who stole his food.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The larvae try to escape a pair of windshield wipers; Yellow gets fed up with Red and seeks revenge; A bug collector traps the larvae and their pals.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A brain injury turns Yellow into a high-tech superhero; Yellow finds himself adrift at sea; A stick insect becomes an accidental fashion model.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: The larvae taunt a mosquito that's chasing them; The stick insect falls in love, but it has a deadly effect on him; The larvae get trapped on a ledge.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Yellow makes a sacrifice to save Red; Red wants Yellow's girlfriend for himself; The larvae unexpectedly leave New York and are taken on a wild ride.
episodes.title: Episode 8
